note:
East Dorset, UK based humanist & socialist (LoC).

Single Grandad (grandkids call me Bumpy), I'm a big (fat) old softy, fun & laughs is my norm.

Music Mad, especially from my youth, late 60s & all the 70s (Take me back).

Also love:
Going to Gigs
Walking/Travel in UK (Motorhome)
Reading (anything, but mostly Fantasy, SciFi, Crime)

I hate what is happening to my country & the natural world & fear for my grandkids.

This reads like a "dating ad", so pics & bios welcome ladies (joking).
